abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises 330.06 points, or 3 percent, to 11,433.18; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index gains 39.43 points, or 3.4 percent, to 1,194.89; Nasdaq composite index advances 86.70 points, or 3.5 percent, to 2,566.05.
snippet: Stocks rose sharply on Monday after a renewed pledge by France and Germany to come up with a plan to tackle the euro zone debt crisis and support the region’s banks.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose sharply on Monday after a renewed pledge by France and Germany to come up with a plan to tackle the euro zone debt crisis and support the region’s banks.

headline.main: Light Trading Helps Push Big Gains on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Light Trading Helps Push Big Gains on Wall Street
headline.seo: Wall St. Gains on Hopes for Europe Bank Plan
